Organization.description: Contains information about an identifiable organization such as a business, a tribe, or any other grouping of people.
Organization.title: Organization

Person.description: Contains a proper noun or proper-noun phrase referring to a person, possibly including one or more of the person's forenames, surnames, honorifics, added names, etc.

first_name.description: Contains a first name, given or baptismal name.
first_name.title: First Name

middle_name.description: Contains a middle name, written between a person's first and surname. It is often abbreviated.
middle_name.title: Middle Name

surname.description: Contains a family (inherited) name of a person, as opposed to a given, baptismal, or nick name.
surname.title: Surname

name_link.description: Contains a connecting phrase or link used within a name but not regarded as part of it, such as 'van der' or 'of'.
name_link.title: Name Link

role_name.description: Contains a name component which indicates that the referent has a particular role or position in society, such as an official title or rank.
role_name.title: Role Name

Person.title: Person

description: A reference based on the TEI biblstruct format.

analytic_title.description: This title applies to an analytic item, such as an article, poem, or other work published as part of a larger item.
analytic_title.title: Analytic Title

monographic_title.description: This title applies to a monograph such as a book or other item considered to be a distinct publication, including single volumes of multi-volume works.
monographic_title.title: Monographic Title

journal_title.description: This title applies to any serial or periodical publication such as a journal, magazine, or newspaper.
journal_title.title: Journal Title

authors.description: Contains the name or names of the authors, personal or corporate, of a work; for example in the same form as that provided by a recognized bibliographic name authority.
authors.title: Authors

editors.description: Contains a secondary statement of responsibility for a bibliographic item, for example the name of an individual, institution or organization, (or of several such) acting as editor, compiler, etc.
editors.title: Editors

publisher.description: Contains the name of the organization responsible for the publication or distribution of a bibliographic item.
publisher.title: Publisher

translator.description: Contains the name of the translator of a work.

publication_date.description: Contains the date of publication in any format.
publication_date.title: Publication Date

publication_place.description: Contains the name of the place where a bibliographic item was published.
publication_place.title: Publication Place

volume.description: Defines the scope of a bibliographic reference in terms of the volume of a larger work.
volume.title: Volume

issue.description: Defines the scope of a bibliographic reference in terms of an issue number, or issue numbers.
issue.title: Issue

pages.description: Defines the scope of a bibliographic reference in terms of page numbers.
pages.title: Pages

cited_range.description: Defines the range of cited content, often represented by pages or other units.
cited_range.title: Cited Range

footnote_number.description: Contains the number of the footnote in which the reference occurs.
footnote_number.title: Footnote Number

refs.description: Defines references to another location, possibly modified by additional text or comment.
refs.title: Refs

title: Reference
